nodes.text: Star Wars Roleplaying Game Specialization Deck

Star Wars Roleplaying Game Specialization Decks are supplementary decks of pre-made cards for use with Fantasy Flight Games' line of cross-compatible roleplaying games. The cards in each deck provide more reference for the array of talents presented in the sourcebooks across Edge of the Empire, Age of Rebellion, and Force and Destiny.
